mapper.select: select c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, s1.title as subjectLevelOne, s2.title as subjectLevelTwo, t.name as teacherName, CONVERT(c.price, decimal (8, 2)) as price from edu_course c left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_parent_id = s2.id where c.id = #{courseId}

select -- 课程基本信息 c.id, c.title, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL (8.2)) as price, c.lesson_num, c.cover, c.buy_count, c.view_count, -- 课程简介 d.description, -- 讲师信息 t.id as teacherId, t.name as teacherName, t.intro, t.avatar, -- 课程分类信息 s1.id as subjectLevelOneId, s1.title as subjectLevelOne, s2.id as subjectLevelTwoId, s2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course c left join edu_course_description d on c.id = d.id left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id = s2.id where c.id = #{courseId}
